caseStudies.title: Regional Construction Company
caseStudies.before: 45 staff across 3 sites — compliance tracking was a spreadsheet nightmare with frequent lapses.
caseStudies.after: On-site training eliminated 2 travel days per person. Zero compliance lapses since partnering.
caseStudies.timeToImplement: Booked in 48 hours, first session within 2 weeks

caseStudies.title: Childcare Centre Group (4 Centres)
caseStudies.before: 60+ educators needing HLTAID012 renewals — admin spent 15+ hours per cycle chasing certificates.
caseStudies.after: Auto-scheduled renewals removed the admin burden entirely. ACECQA audit passed with 100% compliance.
caseStudies.timeToImplement: Booked in 24 hours, all centres trained within 3 weeks

caseStudies.title: Aged Care Facility
caseStudies.before: 30 staff needed CPR + First Aid with minimal disruption to resident care schedules.
caseStudies.after: Split into 3 small groups across a single week — 8 hours total admin time saved per year on tracking.
